author: John Binder, John Binder
title: Coronavirus Jailbreak: NYC Frees 375 Inmates While Car Theft Skyrockets
description: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio (D) is bragging about the number of inmates he is releasing from prison in the midst of the Chinese coronavirus crisis while car theft skyrockets in the city.
content:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio (D) is bragging about the number of inmates he is releasing from prison in the midst of the Chinese coronavirus crisis while car theft skyrockets in the city.
